snippet: The bank is expected on Thursday to unveil an extensive round of government bond-buying, a program known as quantitative easing.
abstract: Prospect of new stimulus measures in Europe and increase in oil prices leads to shares ending broadly higher on Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: The bank is expected on Thursday to unveil an extensive round of government bond-buying, a program known as quantitative easing.

headline.main: Wall St. Rises on Prospects for European Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Rises on Prospects for European Stimulus
